newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico's 1,064-day UDI bonds real return 6.87 pct.
newsitem.headline: Mexico's 1,064-day UDI bonds real return 6.87 pct.

text.p: Mexico's 1,064-day UDI bonds were assigned at a price of 99.01196 UDIs and a real return of 6.87 percent at the primary auction on Tuesday.
Two weeks ago 1,078 UDI bonds had a real return of 6.98 percent.

Demand this week was 1.736 billion UDIs, compared to the 250 million UDIs on offer from Banco de Mexico, with a bid-to-cover ratio of 6.94. That compares with two weeks ago when demand was 1.295 billion UDIs with a bid-to-cover ratio of 5.18.
Also at the auction this week, 1,792-day UDIs were assigned at a price of 98.34642 UDIs and a real return of 6.90 percent.
Two weeks ago the 1,806-day UDI bonds had a real return of 6.94 percent.
Demand this week was 1.754 billion UDIs for the 1,792-day UDIs compared to 250 million UDIs on offer with a bid-to-cover ratio of 7.012.
Demand two weeks ago was 1.432 billion UDIs with a bid-to-cover ratio of 5.73.
